dungeonette.domain

Class Specification

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeonette.domain.Specification

  • public class Specification
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for storing the paramets which control the type of dungeon being generated. These parameters are not yet fully implemented, i.e. some parts of the code still containg hardcoded numbers which ignore any of this specification stuff...

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int COMMON 
      int deadEndiness
      Number of additional dead-ends generated per floor
      int density
      minimum number of rooms being generated
      int funnelEffect
      Each depts dungeon floor substracts the density/volatility by multiple of funnelEffect. 1 = no funnelEffect.
      int gridX 
      int gridY 
      int largeRoomPersistence
      how often large sized rooms get (theoretically) generated
      int maxX 
      int maxY 
      int maxZ 
      int midsizeRoomPersistence
      how often mid sized rooms get (theoretically) generated
      int NEVER 
      int passagePersistence
      larger the number, the longer the distance between two neighbouring rooms might be
      int pivotSeekPersistence
      larger the number, the farther the seek for neighbouring room location continues
      int RARE 
      int roomConnectivity
      Number of bonus connecting passageways are generated per floor.
      int roomDensity
      Density of room placement.
      int threeByThrees
      impact the likelyhood of v.large rooms
      int twoByOnes
      impacts the likelyhood of midsized rooms
      int twoByTwos
      impacts the likelyhood of large rooms
      int UNCOMMON 
      int VERY_COMMON 
      int VERY_RARE 
      int volatility
      maximum additional number of rooms being generated NOTE: density+volatility should be less than (gridX*gridY)/2

        public int roomConnectivity
        Number of bonus connecting passageways are generated per floor.

      • density

        public int density
        minimum number of rooms being generated

      • volatility

        public int volatility
        maximum additional number of rooms being generated NOTE: density+volatility should be less than (gridX*gridY)/2

      • funnelEffect

        public int funnelEffect
        Each depts dungeon floor substracts the density/volatility by multiple of funnelEffect. 1 = no funnelEffect.

      • pivotSeekPersistence

        public int pivotSeekPersistence
        larger the number, the farther the seek for neighbouring room location continues

      • passagePersistence

        public int passagePersistence
        larger the number, the longer the distance between two neighbouring rooms might be

      • roomDensity

        public int roomDensity
        Density of room placement. VERY IMPACTFUL to dungeon's appearance... 20 = full room density... 10 = nicely balanced look... 3 = very sparse dungeon

      • midsizeRoomPersistence

        public int midsizeRoomPersistence
        how often mid sized rooms get (theoretically) generated

      • largeRoomPersistence

        public int largeRoomPersistence
        how often large sized rooms get (theoretically) generated

      • twoByOnes

        public int twoByOnes
        impacts the likelyhood of midsized rooms

      • twoByTwos

        public int twoByTwos
        impacts the likelyhood of large rooms

      • threeByThrees

        public int threeByThrees
        impact the likelyhood of v.large rooms
